item.title: “May the Kingdom of God Go Forth”
item.description:
“May the Kingdom of God Go Forth” by President Harold B. Lee, President of the Church given in the Saturday Morning session of the 142nd Semiannual General Conference on Sat Sep 30 1972
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone.
